body:
Features and Enhancements

Specialty Mapping Selection
  • Added ability to change Specialty Mappings to the navigation bar.
    • Specialty Mappings can be selected from a dropdown.
    • Currently selected Specialty Mapping is checked and in bold.
    • If the project has only one available Specialty Mapping, it will checked and in bold.
    • Specialty Mapping options change based on the selected project.
    • Note: The Specialty Mappings tab still appears in Settings and functions the same.
Settings and Help Menus
  • Moved Settings and Help icons to the right side menu bar.
  • Replaced Contact us with a comment icon.
Project information tooltip
  • Added a tooltip to the project selection to give the user more information about the currently selected project.
    • Project Number
    • Project Generation Id
    • Refresh Date
